title: Introducing SWE Effi
abstract: Problem: AI coding assistant leaderboards (e.g., SWE-bench) focus solely on "resolve rate," ignoring the crucial factor of efficiency in a resource-constrained world. Our Solution: We introduce SWE-Effi, a new leaderboard that re-evaluates agents based on a holistic efficiency score. We define efficiency as the balance between resolve rate (the outcome) and the resources consumed (token cost and execution time). We re-ranked popular agent scaffolds on a subset of SWE-bench benchmark using this new, multi-dimensional metric.
